ðŸ“– Summary: The awesome-privacy repository is a curated list of privacy and security-focused software and services, categorized for easy browsing. It aims to help users migrate to open-source alternatives that respect their privacy and protect their data from corporations, governments, and hackers. The repository is mirrored on Codeberg and encourages contributions from the community.
